portalProps.description: Props to pass down to the Portal component when withinPortal is set
portalProps.description_zh: 设置 withinPortal 时向下传递到 Portal 组件的 props

position.type: { top?: string | number; left?: string | number | undefined; bottom?: string | number | undefined; right?: string | number | undefined; } | undefined
position.description: Affix position on screen, defaults value is { bottom: 0, right: 0 }
position.description_zh: 在屏幕上附加位置，默认值为 { bottom： 0， right： 0 }

withinPortal.description: Determines whether component should be rendered within portal, true by default
withinPortal.description_zh: 确定是否应在 Portal 中呈现组件，默认为 true

zIndex.description: Root element z-index property, 200 by default
zIndex.description_zh: 根元素 z-index 属性，默认为 200
